interface.backup.title:
Вы хочаце замяніць бягучыя скрыпты больш старым захаваннем?

Націсніце "Наступная рэзервовая копія", каб выбраць больш старую рэзервовую копію па часе, або націсніце "Усталяваць рэзервовую копію", каб замяніць бягучыя сцэнары рэзервовай копіяй на гэты час

Бягучая апошняя рэзервовая копія:

interface.settings.backup_frequency.enterheight: Enter the backup frequency in minutes
interface.errors.package: Памылка, у складзе карэктнае імя пакета
interface.errors.name: Памылка, імя ўжо існуе
interface.errors.bottom_height: Памылка, лік павінны быць от -300 до 300
interface.errors.backup_frequency: Error, number should be from 1 to 59
interface.errors.scroll_friction: Error, number should be from 10 to 1000
interface.import.successfully: The project has been successfully imported
interface.game.debug: У буфер абмену захаваны код lua

beginner.beginner.start.message: Hi, I see you're here for the first time? I'm a cdog, and you? Let's find out your age, gender and name, do you agree?
beginner.beginner.gender.what: And so, will we find out who you are, a man or a woman?
beginner.beginner.age.what: Now, let's find out your age, I remind you, you can use CCode for people aged from 13 to 90 years
beginner.beginner.age.banned: You are not allowed to use CCode due to age restrictions
beginner.beginner.name.what: And finally, let's find out your name
beginner.beginner.name: Name
beginner.beginner.entrance:
Thank you, now you can start using CCode, little hints: 

In the tab 'My robodog' has a tab for training

By clicking the 'Discord' button on the bottom left of the menu, you can go to the Discord server, where you can ask questions and send bugs

CCode is not the easiest application right now, so a lot of videos on YouTube and help in discord will be very useful for you

robodog.robodog.showAd.title: To get 20 ccoin, you need to watch a video ad
robodog.robodog.showAd.time: You will be able to watch the ad again in minutes:
robodog.robodog.autoAd.title: Do you want to turn on/off autoreview ads? When turned on, a video ad will be shown every 10 minutes, which will bring you 20 ccoin
